answers.answer: Consuming sugar does not give you gestational diabetes, or type two diabetes.  That is a myth.  But it still isn't healthy.Just try to enjoy sugar in moderation.
Oh thanks for that, just worried cos I'm a bit over weight and had blood tests done and had low vitamin d, i am getting supplements, just worried cos we have wanted our second child for a long time!

question: I'm 8 weeks pregnant and can't get enough of anything with sugar, I'm scared for sugar diabetes, yes its a matter of cutting back but what healthy foods can fill the void?
title: s
